name: Pinterest block
descriptionHtml:
Test

async () => {
  const pinId = _config.default.get("blocks.pinterest.pinId");

  await (0, _reporter.testStep)("Add a Pinterest block", async () => {
    const blockId = await blockEditor.insertBlock(
      _pinterest.default.name(),
      _pinterest.default.title()
    );
    const pinterestBlock = new _pinterest.default(blockId, page, pinId);
    await pinterestBlock.addEmbed();
  });
  await (0, _reporter.testStep)(
    "Publish a post with a Pinterest block",
    async () => {
      await blockEditor.selectPostTitle();
      await blockEditor.publishPost();
      await blockEditor.viewPost();
    }
  );
  await (0, _reporter.testStep)(
    "Can assert that Pinterest block is rendered",
    async () => {
      const frontend = await _postFrontend.default.init(page);

      expect(
        await frontend.isRenderedBlockPresent(_pinterest.default, {
          pinId,
        })
      ).toBeTruthy();
    }
  );
};

steps.name: Publish a post with a Pinterest block
Can assert that Pinterest block is rendered
